title: dhIm dhIm dhIm (tillAnA)
sahitya:
dhIm dhIm dhIm tiranA dhiri dhIm dhIm tiranA 
tari udanita dhIm dhIm dhIm tana tiranA tari udanita


anupallavi

  dhIm dhIm nAdhiri udanita dhIm tanatari dhIm nAdhiri 
tOm tari udani tanam tAm dhIm udanita dhIm nAdiri
			(sholkaTTu svara)
taddhim tarikiTajham kiTatakajham tanim takajham natajham takajham taka tarikiTa 
tattittaka tadIngiNatOm tAm tattittaka tadIngiNatOm tAm tattittaka tadIngiNatOm


caraNam    tEnum pAlum tInkaniyum tOrkka ninra shuvai koL nAmam vAnulagOrgaL 
vAzhtta asurar vAtai tIra vElai vAngum vElan nAmamE murugEshan nAmamE
